title: Fund-Fracture Mechanics
description: Advanced study of failure of structural materials under load, mechanics of fracture, and microscopic and macroscopic aspects of the fracture of engineering materials. Crosslisted with AE, CEE, CHE, and MSE 7772.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Cannot be enrolled in one of the following Levels:
__HEADER_1__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: ME 3201 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MSE 3005 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
